title: old record label logos- what are they?????
content:
can anyone please please tell me what these are...  
someone told me the Decca one is custom made, if thats the case can anyone recommend any font as similar as possible?  
same goes for the others as well!  
thankyou!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120414232512im_/http:/typophile.com/files/125px-Atlantic_Records_fan_logo_4224.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120414232512im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Atlantic_Records_4674.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120414232512im_/http:/typophile.com/files/babcoweb_5995.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120414232512im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Deccablacklogo_4849.gif)
author: leif

comments.content: The top "Atlantic" is in Eurostile bold extended. I imagine you could get that slanted A with an alternate Avant Garde A.

thanks elzadra thats great!  
can anyone help with the others???? im desperate to find something as similar as poss to the Decca one!
